* Bug fixes

If you like Instant Translate, would mind to spend a minute to rate us on the App Store? Good ratings and reviews cheer us up to work hardly on further updates!

- no ads
- 13 new languages supported
- ability to translate on return press
- ability to keep the bottom bar not hidden
- bug fixes

If you like Instant Translate, we would be grateful to receive a positive review from you on the App Store! Otherwise, you can anytime write us at insttranslate@gmail.com or to @insttranslate on Twitter to explain what you doesn't like in the app. 

By the way, don't forget that Instant Translate apps are available for a wide range of devices (OS X, Chrome and so on)! More on http://insttranslate.com

- no ads

- ability to translate on return press
- ability to keep the bottom bar not hidden
- bug fixes

If you like Instant Translate, we would be grateful to receive a positive review from you on the App Store! Otherwise, you can anytime write us at insttranslate@gmail.com or to @insttranslate on Twitter to explain what you doesn't like in the app. 

By the way, don't forget that Instant Translate apps are available for a wide range of devices (OS X, Chrome and so on)! More on http://insttranslate.com

This update is a real remarkable milestone for us and for you, our users. We don't lag behind Apple's innovation, so we are introducing the Instant Translate iMessage App and the Instant Translate Lock Screen Widget.

iMessage App:
- 100+ languages right in the iMessage
- write a message in your mother tongue, Instant Translate will translate it and send to your friend

Lock Screen Widget:
- 100+ languages supported
- translate the clipboard contents right on the lock screen
- 6 shortcuts of recently used languages
- copy the result in one tap
- view the full result in the app

Apart the support of the iOS 10's new functions, we also severely improved the main app:
- autocorrection: don't let misspellings mislead you!
- speech recognition (STT) in over 40 languages
- 3D Touch on the icon: translate the clipboard contents or start dictating right from the desktop
- app localization into French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese and Korean
- bug fixes and performance improvements

We hope it will be a pleasure for you to use Instant Translate 2.0. Therefore, we will be glad to see your review on the App Store if you find a minute.

Meet a top-notch app for Apple Watch in this update! Now, you will be able to translate into 103 languages right on your wrist. Travel, work and communicate anywhere with Instant Translate! 

If you don't like something, write us at contact@insttranslate.com. If you like the app, we will be glad to see your review on the App Store.

Meet a top-notch app for Apple Watch in this update! Now, you will be able to translate into 103 languages right on your wrist. Travel, work and communicate anywhere with Instant Translate! 

If you don't like something, write us at contact@insttranslate.com. If you like the app, we will be glad to see your review on the App Store.

Phrasebook:
Save words and phrases offline in wordlists for an upcoming journey or for a foreign-language class. 

Welcome Screen:
A short overview of the main features of the app.

NEW: SELECT AND TRANSLATE ANYWHERE!
From now on, you can select text in any other app, click on "Share..." and get an instant translation right on that screen. You don't need to leave the app you were in anymore to translate something! 

Also we included quick copy translation buttons and fixed a few insignificant bugs in this release.

If you like Instant Translate, we would be happy to see a review from you in the App Store.

We’ve got a massive Instant Translate update here! Now, it’s called Mate. And it’s literally going to become your mate who always has your back with translations, believe us. We made a significant redesign of the app which resulted in vastly improved readability, contrast, and the UX. Every single user-interface element became more perceptible, readable and understandable.

Of course, we also added some amazing features you’ve been asking for. The major one is the synchronization of all your translation history and Phrasebook. Mate now synchronizes all your translations so that you can reference them wherever you want. You can install Mate on a variety of devices and Mate will synchronize between all of them.

Sign up to stay synchronized and up to date with all our future updates!

We also ditched lots of nasty bugs that some of you were reporting about. We’re always trying to improve the app to deliver you the best translation experience ever.

Thanks for staying tuned!

We would be happy about your review on the App Store if you had a free minute. Keep our translation engine running with your reviews!

We've decided to reduce our Mate Pro price by 30% for the Christmas time! Don't miss your chance to get Mate Pro. Sale ends on Dec 27.

You will definitely find Mate useful in the upcoming year regardless if you are planning to go abroad (Mate speech translator won't let you be lost in translation) or start learning a new language (Mate Phrasebook will help you learning new words in a quick way).

Also, we are now giving Mate Pro to all iOS users for free if you've been already using Mate for Mac. If you are, just sign in to the Mate account on your Mac and then to the same account on your iPhone/iPad, it will automatically activate Pro on your iOS device. 

And also we fixed a few minor bugs.

If you liked these updates, we would be happy to see your review on the App Store! 

Mate team wishes you merry Christmas!

We've decided to reduce our Mate Pro price by 30% for the Christmas time! Don't miss your chance to get Mate Pro. Sale ends on Dec 27.

You will definitely find Mate useful in the upcoming year regardless if you are planning to go abroad (Mate speech translator won't let you be lost in translation) or start learning a new language (Mate Phrasebook will help you learning new words in a quick way).

Also, we are now giving Mate Pro to all iOS users for free if you've been already using Mate for Mac. If you are, just sign in to the Mate account on your Mac and then to the same account on your iPhone/iPad, it will automatically activate Pro on your iOS device. 

And also we fixed a few minor bugs.

If you liked these updates, we would be happy to see your review on the App Store! 

Mate team wishes you merry Christmas!

While a lot of you were celebrating Christmas, we were fixing bugs:
– Fixed a bug that lead to wordlists disappearing
– Fixed a bug with reappearing items in history
– Fixed a bug that caused a crash on the plus icon tap on iPad

Spend a minute writing a review if you like Mate, it won't take long and we would really appreciate it!
If you have any questions, contact us at support@matetranslate.com.

We localized Mate to Chinese. 
The speak-out feature did not work for Hebrew, now it does. 
Mate was becoming stuck on iPad when translating via the share menu, now it works like it should.

Follow us on social media:

@MateTranslate

With feedback or ideas, ping us at support@matetranslate.com

Important! You should've already received an email from us which said that we're removing third-party login methods – Facebook and Google. Our decision is privacy and Mate's stability driven. Read more here: https://blog.gikken.co/were-removing-third-party-login-methods-from-mate/

Help Center. We've created a help center where you can find answers to most questions, tutorials, etc. Check it out here: https://help.gikken.co/hc/

Improved:
- Full-page translation in Safari. We rewrote the website translation script. It should be faster, friendlier, and more stable now. Previously, it failed to work on some sites (e.g. Medium.com), now it works perfectly on every site.

Fixed:
- Hebrew full page translation works well again in Safari.
- Issue with AirPods and other earphones was solved. Mate was speaking out via iPhone's loudspeaker even though the earphones were connected. Now it goes via earphones as intended.
- iOS keyboard autocompletion is back in the main app.
- Correct transliteration for Traditional Chinese.
- A couple of light - dark mode bugs were squashed.
- Copy button didn't work in the Safari extension, now it does.
- Safari extension's bar could look ugly on some sites due to CSS confilcts, now it's better.
- Speak-out for the original language didn't work in the Safari extension. We fixed it.
- A nasty sync bug was fixed. Previously, when you signed out, then erased your History and/or Phrasebook, and then sign in again, it would erase it on the server, as well. Now, it won't. All actions that you do when you're signed out stay on your device.

Important! You should've already received an email from us which said that we're removing third-party login methods – Facebook and Google. Our decision is privacy and Mate's stability driven. Read more here: https://blog.gikken.co/were-removing-third-party-login-methods-from-mate/

Help Center. We've created a help center where you can find answers to most questions, tutorials, etc. Check it out here: https://help.gikken.co/hc/

Improved:
- Full-page translation in Safari. We rewrote the website translation script. It should be faster, friendlier, and more stable now. Previously, it failed to work on some sites (e.g. Medium.com), now it works perfectly on every site.

Fixed:
- Hebrew full page translation works well again in Safari.
- Issue with AirPods and other earphones was solved. Mate was speaking out via iPhone's loudspeaker even though the earphones were connected. Now it goes via earphones as intended.
- iOS keyboard autocompletion is back in the main app.
- Correct transliteration for Traditional Chinese.
- A couple of light - dark mode bugs were squashed.
- Copy button didn't work in the Safari extension, now it does.
- Safari extension's bar could look ugly on some sites due to CSS confilcts, now it's better.
- Speak-out for the original language didn't work in the Safari extension. We fixed it.
- A nasty sync bug was fixed. Previously, when you signed out, then erased your History and/or Phrasebook, and then sign in again, it would erase it on the server, as well. Now, it won't. All actions that you do when you're signed out stay on your device.

We managed to track down and squash all speech translator bugs now. Tapping that microphone button shouldn't crash the app anymore.

Visit our Help Center for FAQ and tutorials: https://help.gikken.co/hc/
Follow us on Twitter for updates: https://twitter.com/MateTranslate

Mate v6 introduces best-in-class Safari extension.

Fully-automatic website translation for 40 languages. Not a single tap required. Browse the web as if there was only one language – your mother tongue.

Best-in-class translation quality.

Select text and get it translated in a little pop-up window that doesn't break your workflow.

How to enable Mate's Safari extension? Tap on aA in Safari's address bar, then Extensions, enable Mate, and give permissions. 

Tell us what you think on Twitter: @MateTranslate

Sincerely,
Team Gikken
